member.name: T:Revalee.Client.Mvc.CallbackActionAttribute
member.summary: Represents an attribute that will restrict access to previously requested callbacks.

member.name: M:Revalee.Client.Mvc.CallbackActionAttribute.OnAuthorization(System.Web.Mvc.AuthorizationContext)
member.summary: Called when a process requests authorization for the marked callback action.
member.param: The filter context, which encapsulates information for using .

member.name: M:Revalee.Client.Mvc.CallbackActionAttribute.OnActionExecuting(System.Web.Mvc.ActionExecutingContext)
member.summary: Called before the action executes to supply cached state information if present.
member.param: The filter context, which encapsulates information for using .

member.name: T:Revalee.Client.Mvc.RevaleeClientSettingsAttribute
member.summary: Represents an attribute that is used to configure callback requests made during this request.

member.name: M:Revalee.Client.Mvc.RevaleeClientSettingsAttribute.OnActionExecuted(System.Web.Mvc.ActionExecutedContext)
member.summary: Called by the ASP.NET MVC framework after the action method executes.
member.param: The filter context.

member.name: M:Revalee.Client.Mvc.RevaleeClientSettingsAttribute.OnActionExecuting(System.Web.Mvc.ActionExecutingContext)
member.summary: Called by the ASP.NET MVC framework before the action method executes.
member.param: The filter context.

member.name: P:Revalee.Client.Mvc.RevaleeClientSettingsAttribute.ServiceBaseUri
member.summary: Gets or sets the service base URL used to make callback requests.
member.returns: The service base URL used to make callback requests.

member.name: P:Revalee.Client.Mvc.RevaleeClientSettingsAttribute.RequestTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the timeout of callback requests in milliseconds, a value of 0 indicates a default timeout period, a value of -1 indicates an infinite timeout period.
member.returns: The timeout of callback requests in milliseconds, a value of 0 indicates a default timeout period, a value of -1 indicates an infinite timeout period.
member.exception: cannot be a negative value unless -1 for an infinite period.

member.name: P:Revalee.Client.Mvc.RevaleeClientSettingsAttribute.TypeId
member.summary: Gets the unique identifier for this attribute.
member.returns: The unique identifier for this attribute.

member.name: T:Revalee.Client.Mvc.RevaleeControllerExtensions
member.summary: Extends to add callback request methods.

member.name: M:Revalee.Client.Mvc.RevaleeControllerExtensions.CallbackAtAsync(System.Web.Mvc.Controller,System.Uri,System.DateTimeOffset)
member.summary: Schedules a callback at a specified time.
member.param: The instance that this method extends.
An absolute that will be requested on the callback.
A that represents the date and time to issue the callback.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the that serves as the identifier for the successfully scheduled callback.
member.exception: The callback request failed during communication with the Revalee service.

member.param: The instance that this method extends.
The that identifies the previously scheduled callback.
The requested absolute of the previously scheduled callback.
